name: biographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to someone's biography (= the story of their life): The modern British monarchy should be considered historically as well as biographically. She wrote a biographically informed novel about a young woman growing up in 1950s California. Related word
biographicalCompare
autobiographically
More examplesFewer examplesThe film is biographically sparse, alluding to his family and upbringing but offering few details.Biographically, the two writers have much in common — similar age, similar background — but their work is very different. Biographically and stylistically he reminds me a lot of George Orwell.
